item.title: Ivanti warns of maximum severity CSA auth bypass vulnerability
item.description: Ivanti has issued a warning about a critical authentication bypass vulnerability in its CSA that could lead to severe security risks.

item.title: Black Basta Ransomware Evolves with Email Bombing, QR Codes, and Social Engineering
item.description: The Black Basta ransomware group has introduced new tactics, including email bombing, QR codes, and social engineering, to enhance their attacks.
